meta.summary:
b"Build em up, break em down: http://bit.ly/MeetTorbjrn

At its height, Overwatch possessed one of the most advanced armaments on the planet, which could be traced to the workshop of an ingenious engineer named Torbjrn Lindholm. In the aftermath of Overwatch's fall, many of Torbjrn's weapons were stolen or stashed away around the world. Feeling responsible for his creations, Torbjrn is determined to stop them from falling into the wrong hands and wreaking havoc on the innocent.

Torbjrn's arsenal includes a rivet gun and forge hammer that he uses to build upgradable turrets and create armor packs for himself and his allies. 

Sign Up for Beta: http://bit.ly/JoinOverwatch 
Like Us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/playoverwatch 
Follow Us on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/playoverwatch"

item.title: Overwatch: NEW Torbjorn META! - The End of Brigitte?

meta.summary:
b"HUGE Torbjorn Rework dropped yesterday with the Halloween Terror event along with the Soldier Orisa McCree BUFFS and Doomfist Brigitte NERFS alongside Pharah damage rework. In todays video, with more practice playing each of these heroes in their new state, we discuss their power level relative to the rest of the game, with a BIG winner being Torb and a major loser remaining Soldier - and possibly Pharah if your skills aren't up to snuff like mine are(n't). The game is going in a very new direction, one where Torbjorn is actually a meta cornerstone to effectively counter Doomfist Sombra and Brigitte brawl comps - I can officially say I've seen everything now lol. If you enjoyed the video, be sure to leave the video a like! -F
